ComicInfo.Summary:
The Resistance Part 2: Bill Savage bursts into a bar and shoots some Volgs; a stranger observes with interest.
Flesh Book 1 Part 2: A Fleshdozer malfunctions, killing two men. As Joe and Reagan head out to fetch more beasts for the slaughter, a pteranodon attack leaves Joe in dire straits.
Vulcan Part 2: John Probe dives from a RAF Nimrod onto the back of the flying Vulcan aircraft filled with nerve gas. Ripping his way inside, a terrorist's bullet punctures a container, causing hallucinations in our hero before he sets the Vulcan down safely in the Thames Mud Flats.
Dan Dare Part 2: Dan Dare fights his way to the commander of the Odyssey, Mr. Monday, to explain his fears about the alien presence in the red spot of Jupiter, only to have the alien itself materialize on the ship.
Harlem Heroes Part 2: As the Harlem Heroes tries to rebuild their team after the deadly crash, they take on old-timer Conrad King, and street aeroball player Zack Harper.
Judge Whitey: After criminal Whitey kills Judge Alvin, Dredd arrests him and sends him to Devil's Island, "a huge traffic island in the middle of a vast inter-city highway complex."
